sentences.en: ...Becket, a recent appointee to the Supreme Court.
sentences.cn: ...贝克特，一个最近刚被任命在最高法院工作的人。

sentences.en: I am a New appointee! Please look after much!
sentences.cn: 我是一只新的手! 请把考虑给我!谢谢你!

sentences.en: The appointee will also use our technology platform to assist with data management and control.
sentences.cn: 税务助理需使用德勤的技术平台,协助数据管理与控制.

sentences.en: the new appointee to the post

words.tran_cn: 任命；指定；约定时间，地点（appoint 的过去分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 被任命者，被指定者，[法]指定的财产受益人
trans.tran_en: An appointee is someone who has been chosen for a particular job or position of responsibility
